snippet: With one race left to increase position before the Nascar Chase field is established, three regulars are all in danger of failing to qualify.
lead_paragraph: With one race left to increase position before the Nascar Chase field is established, three regulars are all in danger of failing to qualify.

headline.seo: Kyle Busch Leads Trio of Chase Regulars in Qualifying
headline.main: With Time Running Out, 3 Chase Fixtures Are Back in the Pack
headline.print_headline: With Time Running Out, 3 Chase Fixtures Are Back in the Pack
